events.message: We have successfully received the application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under Engineering as a Software Developer role based on the candidate's experience and skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the Software Engineer application and coordinate the next steps of the hiring process.
The initial screening for the software engineering candidate was conducted, assessing technical background and cultural fit with positive feedback.
The candidate responded promptly confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the candidate for next week to further evaluate their programming and problem-solving skills.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong coding abilities and in-depth knowledge of software development.
Following the positive technical interview, an HR interview has been arranged to discuss compensation, benefits, and company culture.
